summary.body: Has anybody tried to buy anything from Ikea and have it delivered by them to the Barbican? I have been informed by Customer SErvices that I cannot go to Edmonton to buy my stuff and then have it delivered to EC2, but have to go to CROYDON in order to do this! What tosh! And I cannot order over the phone either! Any suggestions? Like go to John Lewis?
summary.subject: Ikea deliveries
